patterns: tell me about scholarship details
responses: IUB provides financial assistance through Merit Scholarships, Financial Aid, and Tuition Fee Discounts, allowing students to receive only one type at a time, selecting the higher value. Merit Scholarships offer tuition waivers of 30% to 100% based on test results and academic performance. Financial Aid includes need-based support and assistance for the children of Freedom Fighters. Tuition Fee Discounts apply to various categories, such as extra-curricular activities and economically disadvantaged students, with waivers up to 100%. Students must maintain a minimum CGPA and credit hours to remain eligible. Required documentation includes financial statements and academic transcripts. For specifics, students should consult the official IUB guidelines.

patterns: tell me about International Centre for Climate Change and Development
International Centre for Climate Change and Development
International Centre Climate Change and Development
International Centre for Climate Change and Development in iub
Climate Change and Development
icccad
what is icccad
responses: The International Centre for Climate Change and Development (ICCCAD) is one of the leading research and capacity building organizations working on climate change and development in Bangladesh. ICCCAD’s aim is to develop a world-class institution that is closely related to local experience, knowledge and research in one of the countries that is most affected by climate change.

patterns: tell me about Center for Computational and Data Sciencest
Center for Computational and Data Sciences
Center for Computational and Data Sciences
Center for Computational and Data Sciences in iub
ccds
what is ccds
responses: The CCDS focuses on driving transformative progress through research, technology, and human-centric design. Its mission is to advance scientific exploration and decision-making by harnessing computational and data-driven methods. CCDS aims to lead the Fourth Industrial Revolution, foster innovation in industrial automation, and support systems while ensuring ethical technology adoption that prioritizes privacy and mitigates bias for societal well-being.

patterns: riot
riot research center
what is riot research center
responses: Established in 2022 at Independent University, Bangladesh (IUB), the RIoT Center focuses on frontier technologies like Industrial Automation, Robotics, IoT, Cyber Security, AI, and Smart System Design. The center serves as a multidisciplinary hub for students, faculty, and the wider community, offering industry-standard training, workshops, and certifications. It aims to produce skilled professionals for the Fourth Industrial Revolution (4IR) through hands-on labs in Robotics, Industrial Automation, Networking, IoT, and AI. The center also supports cutting-edge research and fosters industry collaboration.

patterns: Bay of Bengal Studies
what is Bay of Bengal Studies
responses: The Center for Bay of Bengal Studies, founded by Independent University, Bangladesh in 2020, is dedicated to advancing research on the Bay of Bengal. It focuses on environmental sustainability, the blue economy, and fostering collaboration among scholars, policymakers, and practitioners to build a knowledge-driven community in the region.

patterns: Social Science Research
what is Social Science Research
cssr
responses: The Centre for Social Science Research (CSSR) at Independent University, Bangladesh (IUB), established in 2013 under the School of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences, focuses on high-quality social science research. It has been recognized as a sub-project under the World Bank-funded Higher Education Quality Enhancement Project (HEQEP), supervised by the University Grants Commission of Bangladesh.

patterns: English Language Resource Center
what is English Language Resource Center
elrc
responses: The ELRC provides English language services to help students enhance their language skills for academic success. It offers various learning resources, including an Online Language Support Hub with access to online language materials, supporting versatile language learning.

patterns: FabLab
what is Fab Lab IUB
Fab Lab IUB
fablab
responses: Fab Lab is part of a global network of makers, artists, designers, and entrepreneurs initiated by the FAB Foundation and MIT. It offers fabrication facilities for creating everything from prototypes to industrial solutions, aiming to equip individuals and organizations with practical, industry-relevant skills.

patterns: Green Energy Research Center
what is Green Energy Research Center
responses: The Green Energy Research Center at IUB researches renewable energy and develops technologies like solar inverters. It collaborates with industries, organizes competitions, and hosts seminars to promote sustainable energy solutions in Bangladesh.

patterns: Institutional Quality Assurance Cell
what is Institutional Quality Assurance Cell
iqac
responses: The Institutional Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC) at IUB operates under the Vice Chancellor's supervision and receives guidance from the Quality Assurance Unit (QAU) at the UGC, Bangladesh. It facilitates communication between academic units and degree programs through Self-Assessment Committees and engages with the Bangladesh Accreditation Council (BAC).

patterns: Institutional Quality Assurance Cell
Kazi Nazrul Islam Research and Study Center
what is Institutional Quality Assurance Cell
Abbasuddin Ahmed Research and Study Center
KNIAARSC
responses: Established in 2012, the Kazi Nazrul Islam and Abbasuddin Ahmed Research and Study Centre (KNIAARSC) celebrates the contributions of national poet Kazi Nazrul Islam and folk singer Abbasuddin Ahmed. It promotes liberal values such as equality, freedom, and tolerance through events and research. The center emphasizes liberal arts by integrating literature, music, and cultural heritage into education, led by Prof. Ahmed Ahsanuzaman with Prof. Niaz Zaman as advisor.

patterns: Graduate Studies, Research and Industrial Relations
what is Graduate Studies, Research and Industrial Relations
GSRIR
responses: To meet the evolving needs of the industry, IUB has established the Office of Graduate Studies, Research, and Industry Relations (GSRIR). This office aims to prepare graduates for industry roles, address industrial challenges through customized master’s programs, and promote research that supports industrial growth.

patterns: Center for Multilingual Excellence
what is Center for Multilingual Excellence
GSRIR
responses: The Center for Multilingual Excellence at IUB fosters a linguistically versatile academic culture to produce globally competent graduates. It promotes linguistic and cultural diversity by facilitating global language learning, enhancing intercultural communication, and preserving endangered languages through research, innovation, and community engagement.

patterns: King Sejong Institute
what is King Sejong Institute
ksi
responses: The King Sejong Institute Dhaka 2 at IUB promotes Korean language and culture in Bangladesh as part of a global network established by the South Korean government. Recognized in 2022, the institute offers immersive courses for all proficiency levels, taught by experienced native instructors.
